My second aim has been to provide students with a fit introduction to the study of Plautus. For this purpose I have been careful to comment on those peculiarities of accidence and syntax, which make the beginner fancy that in studying Plautus he is studying almost a new language, or at least a new dialect. *And Ι think Ι have left no difficulty unex- plained.
